title: #1538 The Data Is In
itunes:title: #1538 The Data Is In
description:
Adam opens the show telling Drew about some frustration he had with an employee who was trying to dissuade an instinct he had about a peculiar name he came across. They then turn to the phones and speak with a metalworker who is heading into a new employment field and is looking for advice & encouragement. Adam then turns to his obsession with the 1970s as he goes down a deep dive on shows and songs with the word 'Run' in the title.
